players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let any mafia members slip through our grasp."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on everyone to ensure the safety of our town."
Charlie: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Diana. Let's all try to be more open and share information to help us figure out what happened."

Bob: "I'm glad we're all being proactive in ensuring the safety of our town. I believe that transparency and open communication will help us uncover the truth behind Diana's death. Let's continue to share any suspicious behavior or information we may have."

You: "I'm still troubled by Diana's sudden death and I believe that we should all continue to be vigilant and share any information we may have. It's important that we work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
